page.title: 10BURLEY HAPPENINGS
page.content: These events took place during the week of 15th to the 22nd June.On the 22nd of June the Church Fete was held at Burley School.The Church Fete is held every year.The country dancing was done by the children from Burley School.There were many stalls at the Fete.A book stall,a plant stall and a white elephant stall.The games at the Fete were guess how many buttons in a jar and how heavy a cake was.One game you had to guess what is the real egg in a tray of shells.If you won you will win a piece of bacon and egg.One of the games you had to toss a ball in to a jar.On the 20th June a brass band came to play to us.In the parish magazine it mentions there is a Garden Club visit to Burley Gardens on Thursday 13th at six o,clock pm.Burley Flower club met on Sunday 16th,and on Thursday a Women's Institute meeting.
